ðŸ“– Summary: Upscayl is a free and open-source AI image upscaler designed for Linux, MacOS, and Windows. It allows users to enhance the resolution of images using AI algorithms like ESRGAN, effectively turning low-resolution images into high-resolution ones. The primary use case is to improve the quality and detail of images, making them suitable for various applications.
